entry.text:
[B6A67B]For the period of subscription you will get:[-]
- Triple in-game shop point income (3 skycoins for every 5 minutes on server). - Special stand out shade of green name color in-game. - Special Discord role and access to the supporter only channels. - Ability to set second home location (/SETHOME2 and /HOME2). - Access to a /BAG chat command that will take you back to your death location. - Access to /DONOR Safe Zone with 5 traders and 2 workbenches - You are allowed to have 17 land claims (24x24 blocks) placed per map. - Permanent player buffs
[B6A67B]Player Buffs -[-] [50c878]Tier 3[-]
- 10% XP Gain increase - 5% Walk/Run speed increase - 10% Stamina regen increase - 10% Noise reduction - 5% loot bonus
